div.head: 子宮不收
div.div: failure of the infant’s palace to recede

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the infant’s palace to recede

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tuo 陰脫 , yin prolapse. A prolapse of the uterus or vaginal mucous membrane, in severe cases resulting in a protrusion out of the vagina that fails to recede into its original position. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 15: 磁石散，治子宮不收， 名瘣疾 , “Powder with ci shi cures an infant’s palace that fails to recede. This is called ‘demonic ailment’”.
